itemLabel: Robert Armstrong, Baron Armstrong of Ilminster

wikipedia_page.main: Robert Temple Armstrong, Baron Armstrong of Ilminster,  (30 March 1927 – 3 April 2020) was a British civil servant and life peer.

link_mentions.page: List of Old Etonians born in the 20th century
response: *Robert Armstrong, Baron Armstrong of Ilminster (1927–2020), Permanent Under-Secretary of State for the Home Department, 1977–1979, and Cabinet Secretary, 1979–1987
